column5: ~~~~Heading down to Picton on Sat. for another shot at some eyes, (note to self the count is 4 each  ) with Slug, going to lanch at the ferry ramp, any one else going to be down there?
I won't be there... but you can giv'em hell for me!!!  Good Luck to you and Slug!!!   ... take lotsa pics!
Best of luck to you and Slug......May the winds and the fish co-operate!
gonna be COLLLLD and Windy on sat.. I was considering it but -17 all day aint fun !!!!
What's your boat look like? I'll be at my friends place over looking the Glenora ferry. My wife keeps telling me it's "not a fishing trip" but I'll still sneak a rod or two in the back of the car.
Might want to check the forcast out....won't be fun at all.
What forecast are you looking at? This is prime time to be out there......the colder the better IMO.  Sinker
i'm debating to go.. so coldddd.. -18.. yikes....
be a man..what's a little cold  I can say that sitting inside a warm house.....LOL

i'll go if you go terry lol.. right now i'm drilling/mounting my plastic peice for the transducer... then i gotta figure out how to put together the transducer/speed and the wirings.. and i better not forget the fuses
LOL  I'm not going to get to install mine till spring
